name: Project Architectuur
description:
Project Architectuur is a game made as a school a assignment. 

The assignment was to make a post apocalyptic world in which we had to come up with new technologies that where sustainable and eco friendly.

In the game you start as a survivor in a cave that you need to open, after that you can explore the world that we made and talk with the locals.

This game has been made by:

devs and artists:

  • Lars Huiting
  • Merijn de Wit
  • Gwen van der Woude

Artists:

  • Melissa Dammers
  • Cas Wijers
  • Leon Jansen
